item.title: Akash Negi
item.description: Akash Negi is the founder and CEO of the WevShip. He has a 4+ years of experience working in a high paced startup.

item.title: Arun Anthony
item.description: Arun Anthony is the software engineer at WevShip. He is passionate about the frontend technologies.

item.title: API Development
item.description: We create API that are scalable and easy to use.

item.title: Mobile App Development
item.description: We create native apps using the react-native therefore creating and launching for IOS and Android.

item.title: MVP Development
item.description: We create and deploy MVP for our clients, with record time and quality.

item.title: Web App Development
item.description: We build and deploy the web app for clients with double the speed and quality while cutting down the time.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are just one phone call or email away on working with each other. Day Opening Hours Tuesday 8:30am - 8:00pm Wednesday 8:30am - 8:00pm Thursday 8:30am - 8:00pm Friday 8:30am - 8:00pm Saturday 8:30am - 8:00pm Sunday 8:30am - 8:00pm

item.title: About
item.description: At WevShip, we are group of highly motivated individuals who want to create smooth and better tech products.
